quote: Be the designer of your own future.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sometimes I can't figure designers out. It's as if they flunked human anatomy.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: There's design, and there's art. Good design is total harmony. There's no better designer than nature - if you look at a branch or a leaf, it's perfect. It's all function. Art is different. It's about emotion. It's about suffering and beauty - but mostly suffering!
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: I love to design. I am a commercial fashion designer. I always design jackets with two sleeves. I don't design jackets with three sleeves, or the layers and layers come off like little dolls from Russia. Fashion for me is a creative endeavor, but it is not art for me.
author: Tom Ford

quote: When I was working in my first job engineering construction, what I liked the most was working with architects and making buildings that had this creative side coming from the architect and that were making them a big success.
author: Bernard Arnault

quote: If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it's within your reach. And it'll be worth every minute you spend alone at night, thinking and thinking about what it is you want to design or build. It'll be worth it, I promise.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: As an artist, you want to make good stories and create good art; as a businessman, you want to make money and make sure the investors are happy. The two will always clash, unfortunately.
author: Neil Jackson

quote: Draw the art you want to see, start the business you want to run, play the music you want to hear, write the books you want to read, build the products you want to use – do the work you want to see done.
author: Austin Kleon,  Steal Like an Artist: 10 Things Nobody Told You About Being Creative

quote: My body is my art, and it's also the tool that I use to make money.
author: Sasha Grey

quote: Art is subject to arbitrary fashion.
author: Kary Mullis

quote: Discover a purpose that gives you passion. Develop a plan that makes you persistent. Design a preparation and motivates you to optimize your potentials. Do it because you love it!
author: Israelmore Ayivor,  Dream Big!: See Your Bigger Picture!

quote: An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have.
author: Andy Warhol,  Andy Warhol, Thirty Are Better Than One

quote: There isn't any great mystery about me. What I do is glamorous and has an awful lot of white-hot attention placed on it. But the actual work requires the same discipline and passion as any job you love doing, be it as a very good pipe fitter or a highly creative artist.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: Design is the method of putting form and content together. Design, just as art, has multiple definitions; there is no single definition. Design can be art. Design can be aesthetics. Design is so simple, that's why it is so complicated.
author: Paul Rand

quote: That's something I learned in art school. I studied graphic design in Germany, and my professor emphasized the responsibility that designers and illustrators have towards the people they create things for.
author: Eric Carle

quote: I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: An artist is someone who can hold two opposing viewpoints and still remain fully functional.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: I did not direct my life. I didn't design it. I never made decisions. Things always came up and made them for me. That's what life is.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: The artist vocation is to send light into the human heart.
author: George Sand

quote: Logos on designer clothes don't make me feel like I've got a strong personal brand. No clothes make the man. Even wearing no clothes I'm still me.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: To do a dull thing with style-now that's what I call art.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: An artist is not paid for his labor but for his vision.
author: James Whistler

quote: The business of art is to reveal the relation between man and his environment.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus.
author: David Hockney

quote: Creating a better futureRequires creativity in the present.
author: Matthew Goldfinger

quote: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: I hope I'm in a position to make stuff that I really want to make as opposed to stuff that I just have to make for money reasons, or to sustain a certain marquee value.
author: Paul Walker

quote: Reinvent new combinations of what you already own. Improvise. Become more creative. Not because you have to, but because you want to. Evolution is the secret for the next step.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Let every man feel that he is the architect and builder of his own life, and that he proposes to make a success of it by working.
author: Heber J. Grant

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
author: Willem de Kooning

quote: I got my diploma from Ealing College of Art, in graphics and illustration.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: I like to reinvent myself — it’s part of my job.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Fashion is about two things: the evolution and the opposite.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: A lot of art and visual crafts are based on appropriating things.
author: Lazaro Hernandez

quote: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I am a work in progress.
author: Violet Yates,  Lost & Found

quote: Create your own style… let it be unique for yourself and yet identifiable for others.
author: Anna Wintour

quote: To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past.
author: Charles J. Givens

quote: With every choice you create the life you’ll live; with every decision you design it.
author: Mollie Marti,  Walking with Justice: Uncommon Lessons from One of Life's Greatest Mentors

quote: Fashion [10w] Clothes makes the man.Fashion, above all, makes the President.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Through art, you create your own world.
author: Daphne Guinness

quote: Anxiety is the handmaiden of creativity
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Never judge a work of art by its defects
author: Washington Allston

quote: Be a great artist especially when you draw your life’s picture.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I paint with shapes.
author: Alexander Calder

quote: A work of art is the unique result of a unique temperament.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The artist belongs to his work, not the work to the artist.
author: Novalis
